briefTitle: A Multicenter Efficacy Study of a Diclofenac+Menthol Gel in Subjects With Ankle Sprain
officialTitle: A Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy and Onset of Pain Relief of Topical MFC51123 Diclofenac-Menthol Gel Versus Controls in Ankle Sprain
summary: This Phase III pivotal efficacy study will assess efficacy and onset of pain relief of MFC51123 gel vs. placebo and MFC51123 gel vs. 1% diclofenac gel and 3% menthol gel in participants with an ankle sprain to support topical MFC51123 gel registration.

primaryOutcome.measure: Area Under the Curve From Day 1 to Day 3 (AUC1-3 Days) of Pain Intensity(PI) on Movement for Diclofenac/Methanol Gel and Placebo Gel
